query.blocking.desc: Runs on players. Returns if the attached player is blocking.

query.health.desc: Runs on players. Returns the attached player's health.

query.is_alive.desc: Runs on players. Returns if the attached player is alive.

query.is_breathing.desc: Runs on players. Returns if the attached player is breathing.

query.is_charged.desc: Runs on creepers. Returns if the attached creeper is charged.

query.is_chested.desc: Runs on donkeys. Returns if the attached donkey is chested.

query.is_digging.desc: Runs on players. Returns if the attached player is digging.

query.is_eating.desc: Runs on players. Returns if the attached player is eating.

query.is_emoting.desc: Runs on players. Returns if the attached player is emoting.

query.is_gliding.desc: Runs on players. Returns if the attached player is gliding on an elytra.

query.is_idling.desc: Runs on players. Returns if the attached player is idling.

query.is_in_water.desc: Runs on the given entities. Returns if the entity is in water.

query.is_in_water_or_rain.desc: Runs on the given entities. Returns if the entity is in water or rain.

query.is_jumping.desc: Runs on players. Returns if the attached player is pressing the jump button.

query.is_sneaking.desc: Runs on players. Returns if the attached player is sneaking.

query.is_sprinting.desc: Runs on players. Returns if the attached player is sprinting.

query.is_moving.desc: Runs on the given entities. Returns if the entity is moving.

query.is_on_fire.desc: Runs on the given entities. Returns if the entity is on fire.

query.is_on_ground.desc: Runs on the given entities. Returns if the entity is on the ground.

query.is_sheared.desc: Runs on sheep. Returns if the sheep is sheared.

query.moon_phase.desc: Runs on players. Returns the current phase of the moon, 0-7. 0 being full moon.
